    • Method Detail

      • buildTermContextMatrix

        public float[][] buildTermContextMatrix​(java.lang.String trainingCorpus,
                                        int dim,
                                        java.lang.String[] allWords)
                                 throws java.io.IOException,
                                        java.io.FileNotFoundException
        Building the Term-Context Matrix by accepting the word.txt file since you can't compare words to a number.
        Parameters:
        file - Word.txt file path
        dim - The dimensions of the matrix, which is |V| by |V| or the size of the lexicon.
        allWords - All of the unique words in the lexicon. Time Complexity: O(D*V^3) Space Complexity: O(V^7)
        Returns:
        The term-context matrix after calculating PPMI and its adjustments
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        java.io.FileNotFoundException

      • ppmi

        public float ppmi​(float[][] matrix,
                  int indexWord1,
                  int indexWord2,
                  float matrixTotal,
                  float rowTotal,
                  float colTotal)
        Function to be used for calculating the PPMI (Positive Pointwise Mutual Information) in order to translate raw frequencies into more useful data.
        Parameters:
        matrix - Term-context matrix
        indexWord1 - Index position of the row
        indexWord2 - Index position of the column
        matrixTotal - The total of the entire termContextMatrix for raw frequencies Time Complexity: O(v^4) Number of words in each array Space Complexity: O(1)
        Returns:
        PPMI value for that entry in the term-context matrix

      • ppmiAdjustment

        public float ppmiAdjustment​(float word,
                            float power,
                            float sum)
        PPMI Adjustment for the rare cases of words that causes extremely high PPMI values
        Parameters:
        word - The sum of that row's values.
        power - The power to raise the row's values by.
        sum - Total sum of matrix. Time Complexity: O(1) Space Complexity: O(1)
        Returns:
        The adjusted PPMI value.

      • calculateSimilarity

        public double calculateSimilarity​(float[][] matrix,
                                  int indexWord1,
                                  int indexWord2)
        Used to determine if two words are similar in context by frequencies.
        Parameters:
        matrix - The term-context matrix.
        indexWord1 - Index position of the first word.
        indexWord2 - Index position of the second word. Time Complexity: O(V) Space Complexity: O(V)
        Returns:
        The amount of similarity between two words.

      • getContext

        public java.lang.String[] getContext​(float[][] matrix,
                                     int indexWord,
                                     int numberToExtract)
        Gets the k number of relevant words to a specified word
        Parameters:
        matrix - The term-context matrix
        indexWord - The specified word to get relevant words from
        Returns:
        The k number of relevant words

      • rowColSum

        public float rowColSum​(float[] arr)
        Helper method to calculate the sum of a row array
        Parameters:
        arr - The array to be summed Time Complexity: O(v) Space Complexity: O(1)
        Returns:
        The sum of the row array

      • totalSum

        public float totalSum​(float[][] arr)
        Helper method to find total sum of a 2D array
        Parameters:
        arr - The 2D array to be summed Time Complexity: O(v^2) Space Complexity: O(v^2)
        Returns:
        Sum of the entire array

      • getColumnArray

        public float[] getColumnArray​(float[][] matrix,
                              int col)
        Helper method to get an array of the specified column
        Parameters:
        matrix - The term-context matrix
        col - The specified column Time Complexity: O(v) Space Complexity: O(v^2)
        Returns:
        Array of specified column

      • binarySearch

        public int binarySearch​(java.lang.String[] matrix,
                        java.lang.String word)
        Helper method to search for a specified word in the allWords array
        Parameters:
        matrix - The allWords array
        word - The specified word Time Complexity: O(lg(V)) Space Complexity: O(V)
        Returns:
        The index position of the specified word, or -1 if not found
